projectGridLines.title: Web Developer
projectGridLines.description:
About this opportunity

We are seeking a motivated individual to join our team as an Entry-Level developer who is willing to learn Angular and Dot

net core. Prior experience is not required, making this an excellent opportunity for those looking to start their career in

supportive and growth-oriented environment.

In this role, you will...

• Develop and maintain web applications using Angular and Dot net

• Design of new services and integrate with different other modules.

• Be responsible for E2E implementation of new features.

• Collaborate with teams from across locations

• Work in a fast-paced agile environment where the product development and business requirements may change

constantly.

• Create innovative solutions to web design issues to help make the website more visually appealing and enhance

usability.

In this role, you’ll need ...

• Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field, or equivalent educational

experience.

• Foundational understanding of OOPS, Data Structures, and other programming concepts.

• Knowledge/Experience of any programming languages like Dot Net, Java, Python, JavaScript and etc.

• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

• Excellent communication and teamwork capabilities.

• A proactive learning mindset and adaptability in a dynamic environment.

• Preferred (but not required):

• Knowledge/Experience on AWS

• Knowledge/Experience on CI/CD

• Knowledge/Experience on Dockers/Kubernetes
